statements: SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT customer_id, room_number, wifi_preference FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT room_number, tv_preference FROM preferences WHERE tv_preference = 'Yes';
SELECT customer_id, room_number, ac_preference FROM preferences ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT wifi_preference, tv_preference, ac_preference FROM preferences;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT room_number, wifi_preference FROM preferences WHERE tv_preference = 'Preferred';
SELECT ac_preference, COUNT(*) FROM preferences GROUP BY ac_preference ORDER BY ac_preference DESC;
SELECT customer_id, room_number, tv_preference FROM preferences WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT tv_preference FROM preferences WHERE wifi_preference = 'Strong';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, room_type FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY room_type DESC;
SELECT customer_id, pillow_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE pillow_preference = 'Firm' LIMIT 3;
SELECT amenity_name, price FROM amenities_catalog WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, room_type, extra_amenities FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE room_type='Suite' AND pillow_preference='Firm'
SELECT customer_id, room_type FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id=100
SELECT customer_id, room_type, pillow_preference, extra_amenities FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT amenity_name, amenity_description, price FROM amenities_catalog WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC, amenity_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, room_type, pillow_preference, extra_amenities FROM customer_preferences WHERE room_type='Standard'
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT room_type, bed_preference, tv_preference FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT room_type, room_price FROM room_types WHERE room_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM room_types ORDER BY room_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, bed_type, bed_size FROM customer_preferences JOIN bed_options ON customer_preferences.bed_preference = bed_options.bed_type;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, room_type FROM customer_preferences WHERE tv_preference = TRUE;
SELECT cp.customer_id, cp.room_type, rt.room_description FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN room_types rt ON cp.room_type = rt.room_type_id;
SELECT cp.customer_id, rt.room_description, bo.bed_type FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN room_types rt ON cp.room_type = rt.room_type_id JOIN bed_options bo ON cp.bed_preference = bo.bed_option_id;

SELECT cp.customer_id, rt.room_description, bo.bed_type FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN room_types rt ON cp.room_type = rt.room_type_id JOIN bed_options bo ON cp.bed_preference = bo.bed_option_id WHERE cp.tv_preference = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT room_type, price FROM rooms WHERE price < 100;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM amenities ORDER BY category DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT room_type, price FROM rooms ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amenity_name, price FROM customers c JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN amenities a ON cp.preference_id = a.amenity_id;
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE category = 'Spa' AND price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT amenity_name, description FROM amenities WHERE id = 1
SELECT customer_id, amenity_id, rating FROM customer_preferences WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT rating_value FROM ratings
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.name, a.amenity_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id LEFT JOIN amenities a ON cp.amenity_id = a.id WHERE cp.rating > 3 ORDER BY c.name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.name, SUM(r.rating_value) AS total_rating FROM customers c JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id JOIN amenities a ON cp.amenity_id = a.id JOIN ratings r ON cp.rating = r.id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.name, a.amenity_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id JOIN amenities a ON cp.amenity_id = a.id WHERE cp.rating >= 4 ORDER BY c.name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM customers c LEFT JOIN logs l ON c.id = l.log_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 0 ORDER BY total_logs DESC LIMIT 5
